title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Arrived with liquid damage mainly in rtc area. Replaced  everything but still no power. TP from PPVOUT_S0_PCH_DCPRTC was nearly destroyed. Attempted to jumper from what was left of that to C0805 but no change.

Any other ideas to try or is this a no fix since signal comes from PCH? I do not see anywhere else on the board view to run a jumper to.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Currently on 0.323V at C0895

title: 820-00165 no power
message: fluctuates from 0.323V to 1.5V

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Voltage and resistance to ground on PPVRTC_G3H?

title: 820-00165 no power
message: PPVRTC_G3H  3.3v and 0 resistance to ground

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
"0 resistance to ground"
Do you mean OL?
Unless you checked without removing power from the MLB.
I cannot imagine how do you get 3.3V over 0 ohm resistor...

DCPRTC voltage is only for PCH internal use; 1.5V as normal.
I'm not sure if C0895 is so critical.

Check the 4 PCH's RTC signals.

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
PPVRTC_G3H  16.15 resistance to ground

RTC_RESET_L 3.3V

PCH_SRTCRST_L 3.3V

PCH_INTVRMEN 3.2V

PCH_INTRUDER_L 3.065v

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
"16.15"
???
Looks good as time value.
No idea if that can be ohm, Kohm, Mohm...

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Some power rails are fluctuating

CPUVR_PGOOD_R only 0.51V

PM_S0_PGOOD flucuates around 0.400-0.450V

0V on PM_SLP_S4_L

what should be checked next?

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Post PM_BATLOW_L, 3V3_S5, 3V3_SUS, PM_DSWPWRGD, PCH_DSWVRMEN.

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
PM_BATLOW_L 3.3V

3V3_S5 3.3V

3V3_SUS fluctuates between 1.3v-1.9V

PM_DSWPWRGD 3.4V

PCH_DSWVRMEN 3.3V

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Post PM_SLP_SUS_L level.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: PM_SLP_SUS_L  3.3V

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
If stable, then 3V3_SUS must be present and stable too.
If no short, then change U8020.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: no short. After changing U8020 3v3_SUS now stable at 3.090V but board still now powering on

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L at same time.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: PM_PWRBTN_L drops to 0 when SMC_ONOFF_L is triggered

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Check now if PM_SLP_Sx_L signals pulse at same time.
Also be sure PM_RSMRST_L is steady 3V.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: PM_RSMRST_L  only 2.7V

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
PM_SLP_S3_BUF_L 0V  no pulse

PM_SLP_S3_L 0V no pulse

PM_SLP_S0_L 2.7V with and without SMC_ONOFF_L triggered

PM_SLP_S4_L 0V no pulse

PM_SLP_S5_L 0v no pulse

PM_SLP_SUS_L 3.3V without SMC_ONOFF_L triggered

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Looks like PCH issue...
